overview: 2011 was a record year for extreme weather. From tornadoes to wild fires to floods, the damage and destruction across the country destroyed lives and cost billions. But through the devastation and tragedy, heroes emerged.  The Weather Channel is thanking those heroes with an Epic Christmas they’ll never forget! Hosted by Steve Watson, whose hometown of Cleveland, Tennessee was among those devastated by weather in 2011, Epic Christmas will pay back our weather heroes with a guaranteed white Christmas. We’re talking tons of fake snow, miles of of holiday lights and outrageous Christmas themed builds. Get ready, this Christmas is going to be epic!
title: Epic Christmas
